page.title: 06Landscape
page.content: The designated area is predominantly farmland. Three main land-use categories can be identified, namely- 10 FARMLAND - Crops other than grass, 11 FARMLAND - Intensively managed grassland, 14 WOODLAND - Dominantly deciduous trees. In addition we included a subcategory made up of orchard crops with grassland underneath used for grazing sheep or cattle. This area was given the code 10b, being halfway between the other main categories. For ease of recognition the following colour code was used- 10 YELLOW - Arable crops, 10b RED - Orchard, 11 DARK GREEN - Grassland, 14 LIGHT GREEN - Woodland. The enclosed map reveals a land-use pattern that is fairly closely related
